dmca.title: Google DMCA - Peter Conway
dmca.body:
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

Peter A. Conway
Managing Director
DownTowns-R-US.com
1669 Sheppard Avenue
Norfolk, VA 23518
(757)333-5068


January 15, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Unauthorized Use of Registered Copyright Material/DMCA Complaint

Dear Sir or Madame:

It has come to our attention that this unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright infringement under section 1301 of the U.S. Copyright Act. Depending upon the type of service Google, Inc. is providing to this Web address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not expeditiously remove or disable access to the image listed below:

1.The Copyrighted work at issue is the map image that appears on: http://www.seattle-downtown.com/hotels/sutton-suites.html#1
http://www.seattle-downtown.com/images/hotels/sutton-suites/suttonseateac-map.gif

This image is registered under U.S. Copyright TX-6-036-414, TX-6-182-998 & VA-1-291-190

2.Search Query: sutton suites seattle http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=sutton+suites+seattle )

Infringing Web Page:
http://www.suttonsuites.com/

Additional infringing pages include:
http://www.suttonsuites.com/Seatac_Airport_Hotel_photos.htm http://www.suttonsuites.com/suttonsuites_airport_hotel_Rates.htm

3.My Contact Information:

Peter Conway
1669 Sheppard Avenue
Norfolk, VA 23518
(757) 333-5068
Email: peter@downtowns-r-us.com

4.Offenders Contact Information:

SuttonSuites@yahoo.com
3423 S. 160th Street
SeaTac, WA 98188
(206) 431-6884
